title: Eddie Needs Parenting Advice + Bobby Talks With Limb Lengthening Doctor + One Line Movie Game!
itunes:title: Eddie Needs Parenting Advice + Bobby Talks With Limb Lengthening Doctor + One Line Movie Game!
description:
Eddie's oldest son is now a teenager so our listeners called in to give advice on raising and living with a teenager. Bobby talks with Dr. Debipershad about making him taller with surgery. Plus, we play the “One Line” movie quote game!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
